H0.text: Liverpool played against whom in the first ever ‘Match of the Day’ in 1964. Manchester United

H1.text: Liverpool played against whom in the first ever ‘Match of the Day’ in 1964. Tottenham Hotspur

H2.text: Liverpool played against whom in the first ever ‘Match of the Day’ in 1964. Chelsea

H3.text: Liverpool played against whom in the first ever ‘Match of the Day’ in 1964. ARSENAL

A4.text: Liverpool featured in the first edition of BBC's Match of the Day, which screened highlights of their match against Arsenal at Anfield on 22 August 1964.
